Description:
North Facing Titled Block
Located in Clyde North Delaray Estate featuring stunning wetlands, board walks, parklands, playgrounds, public art and large waterfront homesites. This land should be on wish list to either build to move in or to invest. Featuring:
-Block size approx. 400m2 (12.50m X 32.00m)
-Popular North facing rectangular size block
-Off street parking facilities
-Creek Views
With access to Club Delaray you can enjoy the unique lifestyle by getting facilities like gymnasium, tennis, pool and stunning function room.
This well positioned parcel of land offers fantastic creek views and an amazing range of amenities close by.
Don't delay, call Yogi Patel - 0451 719 161 to discuss further.

Description:
Young bright modern
If you like a home that is literally just across all amenities then this near new modern house is for you! Consisting of three large bedrooms all with robes (master with walk in robe) light filled ensuite bathroom and main bathroom with bathtub and separate toilet.
Additional features include:
- Gourmet kitchen with window splashback, waterfall stone benchtops and high quality European Ariston appliances, as featured on MasterChef.
- Open light filled living area complete with Led downlights and formal lounge upstairs.
- Double remote lock up garage with internal and rear access.
- Sliding door access to alfresco with downlights and outdoor power.
- Low maintenance landscaped yards.
Located in beautiful Seladra Rise Estate, this 1-year young well-designed Sienna Homes property will tick all the boxes. Only short drive from freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Only minutes away are the popular Clyde Primary School, Cranbourne East Primary School, St Peter's College campus, plus Casey Fields football ground, Casey Race Aquatic Centre and the newly built Selandra Rise Shopping Centre. It also boasts its own community place, which provides residents with sustainability information, access to health and wellbeing activities.
Insights: 9 Portrait Place, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
THE PERFECT HOME IN A EVEN MORE PERFECT LOCATION !!
located in a family friendly street within the highly sought after Clyde Springs estate, this is an amazing opportunity to own this BRAND NEW, family residence.
Designed with a versatile floorplan and with easy family living in mind, this meticulous home comprises 4 generous bedrooms (separately zoned main bedroom), full ensuite, formal lounge, modern well-appointed kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops, open casual dining area, separate family living and remote double garage with internal access, a second living room and to top it all of an alfresco that allows the beautiful interior of this large home to flow effortlessly into the spacious backyard.
Outdoors offers a spacious fully landscaped backyard - perfect for Summer entertainment, all positioned only moments from parklands, upcoming shopping areas, Casey fields, Clyde Primary school, Hillcrest College and public transport.
Property will start construction very soon !! Much more available !!
Please contact me now for more info
Rinaldi 0422 054 137
*Please note images are for illustration purposes only*

Description:
Incomplete Builders Project
With the frame up and the roof on this project is ready for you to take over and reap the benefits! With its superb location this incomplete home sitting in the one of the best estates - Berwick Waters in College Green, is ready for the smart buyer to finish the dream. Once complete you will have a home of approximately the 29sq sitting on a generous size block of 531m2.
Once complete you will have:
-Four bedrooms
-Master with walk-in robe
-Two living areas plus dining
-Three bathrooms
If you are a builder or the young tradie looking for an opportunity to get your own home or investment property you will know this is the one you have been looking for!
This home is a rare offering in this young vibrant estate perfectly located within a short drive to the freeway and all amenities located in Berwick, Clyde North and Cranbourne. This sensational opportunity is also only minutes away from the popular Hillcrest Primary School and Eden Rise shopping centre
For more details, please feel free to contact Vicky Arora 0430205545.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOUSE IN HIGHGROVE ESTATE - READY TO MOVE IN
Step into this beautifully presented 4bed room property and you will know that this is the one. With spacious master BR with ensuite (double vanity, spectacular sized shower & WIR), 1 separate bathroom and 2 spacious living areas, alfresco, remote control Double lock up garage.
Internal features include: High Ceiling, Gas Ducted Heating and Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop ( Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances), Convenient walk-in butlers pantry, Quality carpet in all bedrooms and timber look flooring in living areas and pantry., Luxury basins and deluxe tapware, Resort style stacker sliding doors
External features include; Driveway, path and fencing ,contemporary front landscaped garden, Estate covenants and guidelines, Recycled water on tap.
Your family can enjoy an active, social lifestyle walking to local new shops and services with large sports and activity zones within minutes along with public schools including St Peters Secondary College, Child care centre, bus stop.
“An astute buyer / investor should not miss this rare opportunity “

Description:
Simply perfect
Nestled in a quiet pocket of the popular Selandra Rise Estate sits this gorgeous, Rawdon Hill built family haven. Whether you’re a first home buyer or searching for a very tidy investment, here is an opportunity you should definitely not let pass you by!
Features include:
- The spacious & centrally located master bedroom featuring classy & elegant pendant lighting comes with its very own full ensuite & walk-in robe. The further 3 great sized bedrooms all include double built-in robes and provide comfortable spaces for family & guests alike
- The modern kitchen showcasing stylish stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven & five burner gas cooktop as well as a dishwasher is perfectly situated towards the rear of the home & overlooks the spacious dining/lounge area where families can easily catch up on all of the day’s event while still taking care of the evening meal preparation
- Inside flows smoothly through to outside via glass sliding doors from the family zone. The entertainment area is completed with a custom made shade sail & offers plenty of room for those relaxing summer barbeques
- Further inclusions: remote garage with internal access, neutral tones & downlights throughout, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, low maintenance “no fuss” gardens, high quality colourbond fencing
Walking distance to Coles (Shopping on Clyde). Close to parks for kids to kick a footy. Access to bus public transport to take you to train station. Also short stroll to St. Peter’s Secondary College and Wilandra Primary School. Ideal location for an investment or first home buyer wanting to enter the market. Act now before it’s too late.

Description:
31.5 Square Single-Storey Stunner on approx. 512m2 Land
Expect more than the standard with designer lines and contours that makes this home a statement of exclusive luxury living showcasing the highest level of fixtures and fittings throughout.
This East facing home displays a clever architect design that provides an easy-care entertaining environment with a choice of outdoor areas offering total privacy. Enjoy 4 bedrooms plus study, of which the master bedroom is the true showstopper boasting a huge walk-in robe, ensuite with twin vanities, spa bath and oversized shower bound to impress all who view it.
The remaining two out of three bedrooms have walk-in-robes, which are serviced by the well-appointed central bathroom and powder room.
Consisting of 3 distinct living zones inclusive of theatre room flowing together with the gourmet kitchen at the heart of the home featuring a stone island waterfall bench, large walk in pantry plus quality appliances.
Other features include:
• High ceilings
• Porcelain tiles
• Gas Ducted Heating
• 900mm Glass Gas Cooktop and Oven
• Glass splashback
• 40mm Kitchen Stone Benchtop
• Evaporate cooling
• Down lights
• Huge laundry with loads of cupboard space
• Powder room
• Quality blinds
• Intercom with alarm system
• Front security door
• Double garage with fitted cupboards and rear roller door
Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan features a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, with local employment and aged care facilities close by. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this property is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the Casey Fields football ground and the aquatic centre.
For more information or to arrange an inspection, please contact Samra Zizak 0481 877 444.

Description:
Comfortable family living
Newly built and meticulously maintained is this three bedroom, two bathroom family home. Only a few minutes' walk to the Selandra Rise shopping complex, childcare centres, health clubs, public transport, lakes and parks, this is a rare opportunity for the lovers of a relaxed lifestyle and low maintenance living.
Complemented by timber floorboards, the abode boasts master bedroom with spacious walk in robe and ensuite, and following down the hall you find another two bedrooms both with built in robes and convenient access to the main bathroom with bath and shower.
-Quality hard wood floors
- Ducted heating
- Internal access to a single lockup garage.
- 900m stainless steel appliances with Caesar stone bench tops and pantry
Step outside to the expansive undercover alfresco area, featuring merbau decking and ceiling fan. It really is a low maintenance lifestyle setting for you all to enjoy all year round.
Call today as this property will go very quickly.

Description:
Attention New home buyers & growing family.
Bloom Estate Agents proudly presents 1 year old house In Clyde North !!f you're looking for a place to call home look no further Located in the highly sought after Bloom Estate, this beautiful home oozes with warmth and charm, perfect for new home buyers or the growing family.
Superbly presented with soft neutral tones the residence features an elegant open living area, a modern kitchen.
The beautiful kitchen overlooks the family and meals area that flows onto the undercover alfresco perfect for entertaining family and friends.
In addition, you will find a formal guest room or alternatively a rumpus room for the kids.
This home comprises a large master bedroom complete with a walk in robe and ensuite with a lovely double vanity.
Another 3 well-equipped bedrooms of a generous size, with built in robes and a modern central bathroom with a separate toilet.
Features include:
• Fully upgraded Metricon home
• Exquisite Facade and Landscaped front yard.
• 4 bed, 2 bath, double garage
• High Ceilings
• Ducted Gas Heating & Evaporative Cooling
• Upgraded kitchen with 900mm appliance &40mm Stone bench-top
• Stone Bench top in Kitchen
• Modern open Plan Kitchen/Dining
• Stone Bench top in Ensuite and Main bathroom
• Down-lights throughout
• Large laundry with lots of storage
• Double garage with remote controlled door
• Quality Window Furnishings
• alfresco provide ample capacity for entertaining.
Situated in the perfect location, surrounded by several south east's famous schools, short drive to Eden Rise Shopping Center and close to all amenities. This sophisticated home embraces a beautiful unique style, be quick as it won't last long!
You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the multiple playgrounds catering for all children ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting ground
A near new home for you to call your own.
You don't want to miss this beautiful opportunity so please call "Jiten on 0405 650 000 " to book an appointment.
Photo ID is a must.

Your new home in Clyde North in Berwick Waters
Comprises 4 bedrooms including a spacious master suite with double vanity, double sized shower and 2 separate living areas. Its contemporary design complimented with ‘High Ceilings’ & ‘Gas Ducted Heating’ is completed with a functional indoor/outdoor resort style alfresco, spacious laundry, walk in pantry, 6 star energy efficiency, generous robes & storage space.
Your new home luxury inclusions:
- Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop
- Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Convenient walk-in pantry
- Quality carpet and quality timber look-flooring throughout
- Luxury basins and deluxe tapware
- Driveway, path and fencing (including gate)
- Convenient remote control garage door
- Resort style timber stacker sliding doors
- Contemporary landscaped
- 50 year structural warranty
- Great land size
- Recycle water on tap
- Fast NBN internet speed though-out estate

Description:
Build Your Dream Home on 275m2!
Get into the market at a fraction of the price and build your dream home! This land is sitting on a great size, rectangular 275 sqm of land and located in the heart of Clyde North! Positioned beautifully and convenient to all facilities such as Local Sports Fields, Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Shopping on Clyde and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Clyde Primary, St Peters College East Campus, Cranbourne East Primary & Secondary Schooling, Casey Fields & Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre (RACE)!
St Germain is located on Thompsons Road, just 10 minutes from the Princes Freeway (M1) and Berwick. Part of the booming south-eastern corridor, it is only 45 minutes from Melbourne’s CBD and 30 minutes from the beautiful coastal towns of the Mornington Peninsula. Inspired by a contemporary European village lifestyle, St Germain is all about living, working, shopping and socialising together in one place. Over 1500 new dwellings will be built, including home sites of varying sizes, designer townhouses and contemporary apartments. There’ll be a vibrant retail strip with modern offices, a retirement village, aged care facility and regional medical centre. Many job opportunities are expected to be created. The St Germain Town Centre proposes a major supermarket and 12 retail shops, alongside restaurants, cafes, childcare facilities, a gym, and office space. In the heart of the Town Centre will be the Village Square, where a proud clock tower will soon become a new landmark and rendezvous point. Set on beautifully landscaped gardens the proposed St Germain Retirement Village will offer independent living options with over 250 dwellings. A central clubhouse will provide recreational facilities such as tennis courts and lawn bowling, offering a premium living experience.
The first phase proposes a super clinic medical facility providing general healthcare and other medical services. A larger regional medical facility in the pipeline will include the addition of specialist consulting suites and a day surgery unit. The Victorian State Government has announced that St Germain will be the City of Casey’s first demonstration project in recent years, bringing with it upfront infrastructure and jobs as well as superb homes to the area.
Please feel free to click on the link below just to see what you are buying lifestyle, community and future.
https://vimeo.com/88818015
With everything nearby, this is a great opportunity to build your dream home & raise your family in a new estate with new home surroundings in an area that is vastly growing! Enquire today before it too late!
TO VIEW THE CONSUMER AFFAIRS DUE DILIGENCE CHECKLIST PLEASE VISIT http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Investors dream or FH buyer's entry
Situated in popular "Delaray Estate "is this stylish double story residence, brimful of natural light and inspiring interiors and exteriors. Built in March 2018,this is a great investment for investors and as well as for first homebuyers as they can move in within 1 year to take advantage of stamp duty savings.

• Tailored for secure low-maintenance living, the property comprises an expansive open plan living, dining and kitchen zone, 3 large bedrooms (main with en-suite), additional bathroom, separate laundry, powder room, double garage with remote control and alfresco. Other prime features include stone bench tops, premium modern flooring, air-conditioning & LED lighting.
• Spacious open plan kitchen with stone bench tops and loads of cupboard space comes fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
• Great sized covered outdoor area and big backyard, suits kids and party people.
• Minutes to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Clyde Shopping Centre, Eclipse Education Centre, Kids On Clyde, bus stop, Cranbourne Station, St. Peters College Cranbourne East & St. Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School, Coles Express service station & Casey RACE.
CLUB DELARAY: Walk to Club Delaray that has below features:
• Café
• Fully-equipped gym
• Tennis court
• Four lane lap pool
• Resort-style play pool
• Function room and theatrette with cinema facilities
• Library and parents' lounge
• Community Garden and Men's Shed
This eye-catching home with 3 bedrooms + study nook, is the remarkable versatile property that suits many buyers and sure to impress, enquire now with Naval on 0401 489 262.

Description:
Serenity in Selandra Rise - Sold by Charles Raj
Nestled in a fantastic pocket in the popular Selandra Rise Estate, this pristine four bedroom home offers generous living space as well as a convenient lifestyle. Featuring brand new carpets & a fresh coat of paint throughout there is literally nothing for you to do but move in and enjoy the low maintenance landscaped gardens and contemporary design.
Features include:
- Large light filled Master bedroom with a walk in robe and its own ensuite featuring twin vanities plus a further three generously sized bedrooms all including built in robes
- The beautiful kitchen showcases stylish stone bench tops which is perfectly complimented by stainless steel appliances including a five burner 900mm gas cooktop and oven plus a dishwasher and built in pantry
- Luxurious open plan living area including dining and family space in addition to a separate lounge room perfect for those fun family movie nights
- Outdoor alfresco area simply perfect to kick back with a glass of wine and entertain guests
- Double remote garage with internal access to the home as well as pedestrian access to the rear yard
- Other features include: Ducted heating throughout, Split System A/C, NBN access & stunning floating laminate floorboards
Conveniently located in Clyde North close to parklands and bus services, easy access to schools such as St. Peter’s Secondary College, Wilandra Primary School and just a 10 minute walk to Selandra Rise Shopping Center with 24/7 Gym. The perfect choice for those looking for a easy, low maintenance lifestyle!

Description:
When buying depends on Quality and Style!
Take the time to inspect this well presented 4 bedroom family home, situated in the ever popular estate of Cascade on Clyde. Currently tenanted until December 2018 and rent return is $1,716 per calendar month. The impressive large master bedroom is situated at the front of the home, offering large walk in robe and ensuite with separate toilet. Comprising of another 3 generous sized bedrooms all of which have built in robes and are serviced by the central main bathroom comprising of separate shower to bath and single vanity. Enjoy the open plan living with kitchen offering walk in pantry, stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances along with loads of bench space. All this overlooks the spacious meals area with slide door out to the rear yard and family room. A second living zone is on offer which can be used as a rumpus room or a family theatre room. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alfresco. Excellent location and only a short walk to Linsell Boulevard which offers an abundance of shops and restaurants. Local bus service is on offer if needed and centrally positioned to local schools. Take the time to walk the scenic trail around the beautiful Cascade wetlands.

Description:
INVESTORS & HOMEOWNERS TAKE NOTE!
If you’re an investor here’s an opportunity to secure a near new property with a return of $3382.00 per month with lease expiring (approx.) June 2019. If you’re a homebuyer looking to buy a house and land package. Why not take advantage of this fabulous opportunity? It could take you up to 2 years before land titles and home is built. Here at 11 Murphy Street Clyde North its already built to perfection and you have the benefit of a rental return until June 2019 with the option to move in after this time. We can connect you with the appropriate broker who understands the lending process on display homes and can help make your dream come true. This desirable four bedroom, award winning ‘Homebuyers Centre’ home includes a stunning kitchen fitted with quality stainless steel appliances and an abundance of both bench top and cupboard space ideally overlooking the main sunlit family area, making entertaining and hosting guests a breeze. The alfresco area offers an abundance of space to entertain with friends and family in the undercover decking area that spills out to synthetic grass. Stylishly appointed with quality floating floor boards, lavish ensuite and main bathroom, ducted heating, evap cooling, internal access from double garage, low maintenance yet tastefully landscaped gardens and much, much more. Well positioned close to great schools, public transport and shopping precincts. Don’t miss this opportunity. It won’t last long!!!

Description:
FOR THE "UPTOWNER" IN YOU!
Clyde North: Selandra Rise Estate: If you are the one who would settle for nothing but the best, this property is for you! From the most sought after location to the most prestigious Builder, this one answers it all. Located in the heart of the very urban "Selandra Rise" this lovely house is fit for a luxurious life and is amazingly accessible.
This Gorgeous house spells quality, in the capitals! 3 great sized bedrooms, Master With full ensuite and WIR. The other two bedrooms have BIRs and are catered to by a central Bathroom. The Comfort Factor of the house is accentuated by the size and quality of the 3 Living areas, including a formal lounge, the Open plan Kitchen/Living/ Meals area and the additional Rumpus Room or Theatre.
The kitchen takes the whole story to another level! With the most premium quality stone bench top, 900mm cooktop, dishwasher(?) stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard and storage space, this one is fit for the queen (or King) of the house!
Main features of the house include:
3 bedrooms
Master with Ensuite/ WIR
3 Living areas
Manicured Front and Back Gardens
Double Car Garage (Roller Shutters/ Remote Control/ Internal Access)
Kitchen (Stone Bench top/ Stainless Steel Appliances/ 900mm cooktop)
Top Quality Tiles to the Common Areas/ Carpet to Bedrooms
Heating: Yes
Cooling: Yes
Dishwasher: Yes
Stone Bench top: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
The location of the house can safely be termed as "Unsurpassed"! Centrally placed, close to all amenities:
Clyde Primary School
Cranbourne East Primary School
Cranbourne East Secondary College
Casey Grammar School
Casey RACE
Casey Library
Casey Fields Sporting Facility
Selandra Rise Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
Train Stations (Cranbourne/ Merinda Park)
Bus Stop
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do!
BEST BUY ON THE MARKET! This fabulous near new home has been built and finished to the highest of standards. Boasting 4 bedrooms, master bedroom with full ensuite and a very spacious walk in robe, remaining 3 bedrooms will easily accommodate double beds and have built in robes. Stunning kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven and a walk in pantry, large sun filled meals family area. Outside you will be greeted by a beautiful decking for all year round entertaining, surrounded by low maintenance gardens. Extra comforts include remote control double garage with internal access plus side access for the boat, caravan or trailer, ducted heating/cooling, timber floors, dishwasher and so much more! Be quick to act, quality homes like this just don't last!
Contact VIC/TAS's #1 Sales Agent - Simon Field on 0400 154 323 for more information!
